title: Her Sworn Protector
description: He held her life in his hands…Hardworking cardiologist Kady Pulaski was dedicated to healing people. Now a patient was dead…and her own life was on the line. One man could keep her safe. She knew him only as Byron, the handsome, enigmaticposition onlybodyguard sworn to protect her from a killer's vengeance. But once desire ignited, Kady faced a different kind of danger.With Kady the only witness to his employer's murder, Byron Kennedy wasn't taking any chances. Keeping the beautiful doctor alive was the ex-cop's first priority. Giving in to passion was a risk, but Byron knew he had to follow his heart no matter where it might lead.
author: Marie Ferrarella
